name: cdpq-redis-sentinel
description: This is a single redis-sentinel instance, which is suited for HA setups. Redis is a popular in-memory data structure store, used as database, cache and message broker.. See documentation for more details: https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/redis
preInstallNotes: It is strongly recommended to use this service with at least 3 redis-sentinels in total.
